title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When opening a Java editor and right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, the expected popup menu to add breakpoints/marks does not appear.
EB: When opening a Java editor and right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, a popup menu should appear allowing users to add breakpoints/marks.
SR: To reproduce: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
